content:
Prev: Long telescope Up: Astronomy Domine Next: Palomar Observatory dome

Scott sets up his scope



It was a good thing we got some viewing in Friday evening, because the sky was much clearer than the next day.
It was a very warm evening -- I didn't need anything over my T-shirt to be quite comfortable.
Taken Friday, August 17, 2001, 07:55:04pm.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 1014kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/2s @ F2.8, ISO 320, 42mm
